ItemTooltips.gloves: To be built into a Hand of Midas
ItemTooltips.boots: Boots of Speed. Everyone needs them.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good for healing after you devour the big creep camp at level 1.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: As you don't have a reliable stun or slow, this is great for escaping if you are being hunted, and good for catching up to fleeing heroes.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: This item enhances your attack speed, and makes your GPM go out of control. Use whenever off cooldown.
ItemTooltips.assault: Attack Speed and Armour. An all-round useful item , seeing that doom has little to no armour.
ItemTooltips.heart: Gives you a great amount of strength, which is your primary stat, and the health and regeneration greatly increases your survivability.
ItemTooltips.rapier: If you are doing a GODLIKE... and you can survive.
ItemTooltips.radiance: The Core item for Doom-Bringer. Yes, it helps your farm, but the damage addition and the burn damage allows you to start really participating in fights.
ItemTooltips.basher: Allows your attacks to have a chance to stun, which is great, and can be built into a Abyssal Blade.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: Good for stats and movement speed. The Slow proc is helpful for getting those pickoff kills.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Lifesteal galore! Great for turning around fights when you activate it.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: More Attack Speed, and the Chain Lightning and Shield increases your teamfight.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Build from your skull basher. Gives you a target-able stun, and insane amounts of damage, and a good amount of Strength
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Not really required , but great to get some mana regeneration and armour.

AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_devour: Great for your farm, and the abilities from the creeps are helpful. Don't activate any of them to farm, as the spells are mana-intensive.
AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_scorched_earth: Good for farming and regeneration, and catching up to those pesky heroes. Also useful for escape.
AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_lvl_death: Good for timing ganks, but make sure they meet the level criteria before moving in, and get your team in the lane to help.
AbilityTooltips.doom_bringer_doom: A counter to all heroes, I recommend using to disable heroes that have invisibility, or team-fight heroes so they cannot cast those troublesome spells.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Stats. You don't have anything else to level ;)
